summary: Machisu is a painter. He never had the success he thinks he is entitled to. Regardless of this, he always remains trying to be successful. His wife Sachiko keeps supporting him, despite all setbacks.
cast: Takeshi Kitano|Kanako Higuchi|Kumiko Asô|Aya Enjôji|Kuruo Hatoyama|Miki Hayashida|Masatô Ibu|Beat Kiyoshi|Taigi Kobayashi|Shôken Kunimoto|Yoshiyuki Morishita|Akira Nakao|Takashi Nishina|Nao Ohmori|Bobby Ologun|Ren Osugi|Yasunari Takeshima|Susumu Terajima|Eri Tokunaga|Mariko Tsutsui|Yûrei Yanagi|Reikô Yoshioka|Takeshi Ôbayashi|Makoto Ôtake
keywords: downward spiral|overalls|written and directed by cast member|three word title|animal in title
title: Aquiles y la tortuga
